column4: Have anyone here experienced making a password for your router, then 36 hours later find that the router dismisses the password without it, the router, being hijacked?
I did that 36 hours ago. Set a new password, one not used before. Now the router says the password, which I pasted from a file, is invalid.
For an estimate, why not insert a live CD, open Synaptic and see how many it says?
